          <title>
            <string language="nl">Hit the target</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">The program gives a number as a target to hit using  three or four numbers, depending on the children's choice. Children have to find out which operation is necessary to reach the target number using two of the three or four  numbers given by the system.
The software has two language options: Italian and English.</string>
